snippet: Fun and folly in Yash Chopra’s final film.
abstract: Fun and folly in Yash Chopra’s final film.
lead_paragraph: Yash Chopra’s final film, “Jab Tak Hai Jaan” (“Till My Last Breath”), “raises the stakes on Bollywood romance to potentially explosive levels,” Nicolas Rapold wrote in The New York Times.”

headline.main: Defuse Bombs? That’s Nothing Next to Love
